channel.title: [NEW] Problem with timers

item.title: [NEW] Problem with timers
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I had a problem with my castle wars waiting room timer yesterday, but now I have a new one…

Heres My Code…

[code]public int cwwr = 120; // castle wars waiting room, 2 = 1 sec, 120 = 1 min, 3600 = 30 min. and izwr is in zammy waiting room
playerHandler.process() {
cwwr-=1;
if(izwr() && cwwr == 0) { //duration = the time on cwwr should be ended
teleportToX = 2404;
teleportToY = 3101;
cwwr = 120;
} else {
teleportToX = 2423;
teleportToY = 9529;
}

}[/code]

And Here’s The Error I Get…

client.java:26: <identifier> expected playerHandler.process() { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Any Ideas on what to do?

                                                                                                                             Thanks, Moose           [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 04:47:49 pm[/size][hr]C'mon anyone?
